mapper.select: SELECT * FROM inquiry_comment WHERE inquiryId = #{inquiryId} ORDER BY createdAt ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry_comment (inquiryId, memberId, parentCommentId, content, createdAt, updatedAt, isNotified) VALUES (#{inquiryId}, #{memberId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{isNotified})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM inquiry_comment WHERE commentId = #{commentId} AND memberId = #{memberId}
DELETE FROM inquiry_comment WHERE commentId = #{commentId} AND memberId = #{memberId} AND parentCommentId IS NOT NULL
